Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista AFP Flex reagent cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Dimension Vista AFP Flex reagent cartridge using chemiluminescent immunoassay to measure alpha-fetoprotein in serum and plasma as an aid in managing non-seminomatous testicular cancer
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of alpha-fetoprotein in human serum and lithium heparinized plasma on the Dimension Vista System as an aid in managing non-seminomatous testicular cancer, when used in conjunction with clinical evaluation
